title.rendered: How to Hide Photos on an Android Tablet

content.rendered:
Android tablets are great for kids, work, creating art, and lots of different things. However, they’re not built to secretly hide explicit photos or private content that need to remain private and for your eyes only. Not to mention, keeping your private content secured is even better for your own personal safety!

In this article, we’ll outline how exactly you can start hiding your photos on your Android tablet. 

Introducing Cover

Cover was created with privacy top of mind. Back in 2018, we saw that the app store needed more than just calculator apps and standard photo vault apps. So we developed the most powerful vault ー built with end-to-end encryption, state of the art image detection, and messaging protection.         

When you use Cover, your Android tablet will be instantly ready to hide any explicit photos and videos. Cover quite literally monitors your device constantly, so you don’t have to. 

The app blocks unsolicited photos in messaging apps like Messenger and keeps your photo gallery clean at all times. 

How to Hide Photos on an Android Tablet 

The first thing you need to do to set up Cover is to download it from the app store. It’s available for free, plus it doesn’t take up a lot of space. 

Once you’re in the app, Cover will ask you to set your Sensitivity level strength and your private photo vault passcode. Once you’re set up, all you need to do is keep Cover installed on your device and let it take care of the rest.

Cover will work it’s photo vault magic as soon as it’s installed on your phone or tablet. It will scan the device all day and all night to monitor for any incoming explicit photos or videos. Once detected, it will catch the content and move it directly to your private vault for your review. 

And again, it will even work within messaging apps! Whether you use Facebook Messenger, Whatsapp, or Telegram to message family, friends, and acquaintances, Cover will have your back. Meaning, if anyone messages you an explicit photo or video, it will be censored, or “covered,” before you can even see the image. 

Cover is compatible with most Android tablets and smartphones. We have no doubt you’ll love having the peace of mind that comes with installing the app.

Download Cover on Your Android Tablet today!
